title: Configs
line1: Almost every feature of this mod can be configured. This page provide you a list of all available configuration options by both mods - "Graves" and "Extended"(if it installed).
line2: To make it easier for you almost every configuration option on this page marked with icon of its type:
line_mobs: those configs about mob spawn and its behaviour.
line_server: those configs designed for server owners.
line3: Both mods share single configuration file which can be found by next path:

graves.title: Graves module
graves.line1: enable/disable graves generation at players death.
graves.line2: enable/disable graves generation at pets(dogs, cats, horses) death.
graves.line3: enable/disable graves generation at villagers death.
graves.line4: allows to use one of swords from your inventory as gravestone at your death.
graves.line5: enable/disable graves generation at death in lava.
graves.line6: restrict graves looting - only owners can loot it or destroy.
graves.line7: allows to place gravestones on any type of surface.
graves.line8: allows to set amount of stored items(in percents) in graves at your death.
graves.line9: all empty graves will be automatically removed in a random time.
graves.line10: this is an addition to previous option. It disable messages when graves removed.
graves.line11: disable grave flowers rendering - you could disable it to increase performance.
graves.line12: sword gravestones rendering mode. Vanilla renderer takes much more resources.
graves.line13: allows to disable graves generation at players death, in any area. You should enter dimension id, start x coordinate, start y coordinate, start z coordinate, end x coordinate, end y coordinate, end z coordinate of the restricted area. Those params should be splitted by ','. This option can take any amount of areas, which should be splitted by ';'.
graves.line14: Next options allows you to disable compatibility modules. It could be useful in case of any problems with those mods(as for example some mod's API can be changed, so you will be able to disable compatibility with those mod, to prevent any bugs or game crashes).
graves.line_battlegear: stores Mine & Blade Battlegear 2 mod's items in graves.
graves.line_camping: stores The Camping Mod's items in graves.
graves.line_baubles: stores Baubles mod's items in graves.
graves.line_mariculture: stores Mariculture mod's items in graves.
graves.line_rpg: stores RPG Inventory mod's items in graves.
graves.line_galacticraft: stores Galacticraft mod's items in graves.
graves.line_backpacks: stores Backpacks mod's items in graves.
graves.line_arsmagica: prevent storing items in graves with ArsMagica soul bound enchantment.
graves.line_enderio: prevent storing items in graves with EnderIO soul bound enchantment.
graves.line_twilightforest: prevent storing some items in graves at Twilight Forest's Charms Of Keeping usage.
graves.line_thaumcraft: allows to use Thaumcraft swords as gravestones.

extended.title: Extended module
extended.line1: allows to choose dimension in which structures can be generated
extended.line2: enable/disable graves generation at world generation
extended.line3: chance(in percents) to generate grave at world generation
extended.line4: enable/disable graves generation at world generation in "Mushroom" biomes
extended.line9: maximum ground height which is allowed to generate catacombs
extended.line11: minimal amount of rooms at first level of catacombs
extended.line12: maximum amount of rooms at first level of catacombs
extended.line13: minimal amount of rooms at second level of catacombs
extended.line14: maximum amount of rooms at second level of catacombs
extended.line15: minimal amount of rooms at third level of catacombs
extended.line16: maximum amount of rooms at third level of catacombs
extended.line17: minimal amount of rooms at fourth level of catacombs
extended.line18: maximum amount of rooms at fourth level of catacombs
extended.line19: enable/disable generation of piles of bones in catacombs(you can disable it to increase performance)
extended.line22: enable/disable undertaker house generation in villages
extended.line24: enable/disable mobs spawn at grave destruction
extended.line25: chance(in percents) to spawn mob by grave
extended.line26: amount of tick per mob spawn. It must be more than 600
extended.line28: enable/disable nightstone(it will not change time if disabled)
extended.line29: enable/disable thunderstone(it will not change weather if disabled)
extended.line30: enable/disable messages at time changing by nightstone
extended.line31: replace haunted chest by chest at usage
extended.line38: enable/disable Zombie dogs spawn in the world
extended.line39: enable/disable Zombie cats spawn in the world
extended.line40: enable/disable Skeleton dogs spawn in the world
extended.line41: enable/disable Skeleton cats spawn in the world
extended.line42: enable/disable Undead horses spawn in the world
extended.line43: enable/disable Skeleton raiders spawn in the world
extended.line44: enable/disable Zombie raiders spawn in the world
extended.line45: enable/disable Skull Crawlers at mobs death
extended.line46: enable/disable Skull Crawlers at bone blocks destruction
extended.line47: enable/disable Skull Crawlers at piles of bones destruction
extended.line48: enable/disable some of the MoCreatures mobs spawn by graves(if it installed)
